On Mon, 3 Nov 2025 at 9:55 PM, Nikhil Somani <nikhil.somani@axxela.in> wrote:

HI Guillaume

 

I have been on leave for the last few days. Joined back today. I'll explore a little more and then we can connect the day after tomorrow? 

 

On Mon, Nov 3, 2025 at 9:42 PM Guillaume Goudy <guillaume.goudy@dnext.io> wrote:

Dear Nikhil,

 

I hope you are well. I wanted to touch base with you and see if you have any questions or feedback?

Look forward to hearing from you,

Best Regards,

Guillaume

From: Nikhil Somani <nikhil.somani@axxela.in>
Sent: Tuesday, 28 October 2025 15:27
To: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>
Cc: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>; M.K. Rajesh <mk.rajesh@axxela.in>
Subject: Re: DNEXT - Login Credentials

 

Hi Saber, 

 

I can’t find a lot of data on the portal. 

 

So yes, a demo would be great. Rajesh Would be happy to attend it tomorrow. Please let us know what time works for you. Anytime post 2pm IST works best for us, but we are flexible. 

 

Request you to use my tria login for demo. We have not changed the password. 

 

Rajesh is copied on this email. 

 

Thanks

Nikhil 

 

On Tue, 28 Oct 2025 at 7:52 PM, Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> wrote:

Dear Nikhil,

 

I hope this message finds you well.

 

I wanted to follow up to ensure you received the login credentials for our platform.

 

If you have any questions or encounter any issues, please don't hesitate to reach out.

 

Additionally, I'd be happy to schedule a demo session at your convenience to walk you through the platform and its key features.

 

Please let me know a time that works best for you.

 

Looking forward to hearing from you.

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

info@dnext.io | www.dnext.io
